mapper.select: select count(g.id) from guide_tuan g where MONTH(g.create_time)=#{month}
select MIN(tuan_date) as startDate ,MAX(tuan_date) as endDate from guide_tuan where goods_no = #{goodsNo};
mapper.insert: insert into guide_tuan (id, name, tuan_no, tuan_date, goods_type, goods_no, create_time, update_time, full_num, person_num, order_num, user_no, user_name, tuan_status, group_id, adult_price, child_price, room_diff_price, safe_price, visa_price, num ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tuanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tuanDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fullNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{personNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tuanStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adultPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{childPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{roomDiffPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{safePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{visaPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

update guide_tuan
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tuan_no = #{tuanNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tuan_date = #{tuanDate,jdbcType=DATE},
